thread.section_title: www.arguscarhire.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.arguscarhire.com | www.arguscarhire.com
thread.title: Sara

author: Sara
title: Sara
text: I didn't realise that I was using a broker initially, so when looking for the car rental kiosk under the name of Alamo or Argus, there was nothing - but a very friendly sales assistant from Buggs told us that the actual car hire firm was Enterprise, so all was well in the end despite initial confusion. Could this not be put in clear print on the paperwork to save a lot of time, apprehension and irritation when trying to collect the car after a potentially long flight? The car had only just been returned from the previous customer so there hadn't been time to clean it, but it was ok anyway. Very friendly bilingual salesman in the Enterprise kiosk dealt with us.
